meanings.definition: To sew a hemstitch in fabric.
meanings.sent1: She carefully hemstitched the edges of the tablecloth.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother always hemstitched her handkerchiefs beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The tailor hemstitched the pants so well, they looked like they were wearing a fancy belt!
meanings.sent4: Her words were hemstitched with kindness, leaving a lasting impression.
meanings.sent5: The delicate lace was hemstitched with precision, creating a stunning effect.

meanings.sent1: The pillowcases had a lovely hemstitched pattern along the edges.
meanings.sent2: She wore a hemstitched dress to the elegant party.
meanings.sent3: The hemstitched napkins added a touch of sophistication to the dinner table.
meanings.sent4: The hemstitched curtains gave the room a cozy and charming feel.
meanings.sent5: The hemstitched table runner added an elegant touch to the dining room decor.
